pages.text: $(item)Brambles$() are witchy weeds, artificially created with the help of $(l:bewitchment:brewing/elemental_oils)$(item)Elemental Oil$().$(br)Each Bramble has a unique effect connected to its $(marked)element$().
$(item)Glowing Bramble$() emits light and prevents mob spawning in a 24 Block radius.
$(item)Ender Bramble$() will teleport anything that collides with it to a random location within a 64 block radius.
$(item)Fruiting Bramble$() will grow $(item)Witchberries$(), which can be used to craft $(marked)ME$()-restoring $(l:bewitchment:tools/brambles#food)$(item)goodies$().
$(item)Scorched Bramble$() will set entities on fire. It can also be used as a relatively decent fuel.
Due to its incredible thickness, $(item)Thick Bramble$() can only be passed while $(marked)sneaking$().
$(item)Fleeting Bramble$() will launch anything that enters it into the air, unless it's $(marked)sneaking$().
